runs.comm: inauspicious start, Rahman drifts it down leg. Wide called
back of a length and skiddy on off, blocked to short cover
on a length and angling across off, Mukhtar drives it to the right of backward point. Mahmudullah gamely chases the ball, slides and keeps it to three
beaten soundly is Shehzad. Moral victory for the bowler. Fullish and curling away with the angle outside off, Shehzad dabbles at it and the ball passes the outside edge
fullish and just outside off, stops on Shehzad. He checks his push, chips it in front of an onrushing Sunny at mid-off. The ball lands in front of him
back of length and on off, defended off the back foot
pitched up and angling away outside off, sticks in the pitch again. Shehzad pushes at it, checks his stroke. The ball drops in front of short cover
drifting onto the leg stump, he takes a step forward and tickles it to short fine
fuller and on the stumps, he skips out, drags it to mid-on off the inner part of the bat
angled in, Mukhtar hacks at it after coming down the track, gets a thick inside edge to the left of square leg. He was not close to the pitch of the ball
round-armish, down the track, off the pad and it dribbles to the leg side
Mukhtar nips down the track again, Shakib pulls his length back, mishit punch to the off side
arm-ball, snakes in with the angle. He camps on the back foot and punchily blocks it back to Shakib
dug in on a back of a length and angling away outside off, Shehzad is crease-bound as he slashes and misses. Beaten
and againn! Teasing movement, leaves Shehzad. He is squared up as he has a feeble poke at it, but does not meet with the ball
length and outside off, Shehzad charges down the track, reaches out and flashes it to point. A direct hit from Sabbir could have put Shehzad in trouble. He slides and makes his ground
very tentative from Shehzad. Angling away outside off, Shehzad nibbles at it, the ball zips past the edge
slanting away outside off, Shehzad is crease-bound as he pushes. He just can't nick it off
length ball angling away outside off, Shehzad reaches out, slices it past backward point
length and outside off, Shehzad swipes, off the toe-end to mid-on
fuller and outside off, cracked wide of backward point. They hustle across for a single
good length and outside off, Mukhtar throws his bat at it, the bat twists in his hand. Yet, he manages to slice it over the covers. Not too sure if that was the change of pace
better connection now! Length and width on offer, he takes the aerial route, thrashing it over the covers, sped away to the boundary
fullish and comes in a smidge from outside off, Mukhtar throws his bat at it, fails to connect
back of a length and cuts back in on off, tucking up Mukhtar for room. Punchily defended back to Mash
Shehzad steps away, Sunny follows him like  stalker, fired outside leg. Blocked back
tossed up a bit, Shehzad saunters down the track, meets the pitch of the ball and lofts it over mid-on. This should give him some confidence
length from Sunny around off, he nips down the track and whips it over wide mid-on, one-bounce four
Shehzad backs away outside leg, Sunny fires on middle. The former shuffles across off and paddles it to short fine
down the track and whippily driven down to long-on
Mukhtar backs away, Sunny is smart enough to follow him. However, the debutant lashes a drive, picking the gap between covers and mid-off
he makes room outside leg and winds up. Shakib slows it up and angles it outside leg, blocked back

flatter and quicker, Shakib pulls his length back. Shehzad steps out, may have got an inside-edge that dribbles towards the covers. There is a communication breakdown, but Shakib does not collect the ball cleanly
mighty full, near yorker, Shehzad backs away and jabs it to the covers
low full toss, slapped to the covers. They scamper across for one. The fielder fails to effect a direct hit
Mushfiq fluffs a stumping chance. Mukhtar steps forward, backs away outside leg. Shakib is wary of that as he follows him. Mushfiq moves to his left but can't collect the ball
on the fuller side, paddled to short fine, finds the fielder
angling in on the pads, Mukhtar can't glance it away. Rolls in front of short midwicket off the pad
back of a length and hurled outside off, Shehzad shuffles across off, slashes but does not connect
Shehzad premeditates, shuffles across off, Taskin shortens his length, dabbed to the right of Mushfiq with soft hands
fuller and angling in outside off, whipped away towards mid-on for another of those scampered singles
he nips down the track to this length-ball and carves it away. The off-side sweeper mops it up
he backs outside outside leg, Taskin keeps his cool and delivers a good-length ball outside off. Mukhtar wants to launch it out of the park, but fails to connect
length outside off, slowy in pace I guess, he steps away, swings and misses
length ball on middle, Shehzad. Looks like a offcutter. Swiped to deep midwicket. The throw from the deep was off-radar. Shehzad slides and makes his ground
back of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket again. This time, only a single results
slower ball. It is parcelled up and dispatched. He backs away, bends his knee and flat-bats it past the bowler, through mid-off, speeds away
fullish and on middle and leg, he looks to paddle it away. Off the pad, it was sliding down leg and they steal a leg-bye
what was Shehzad doing there? Fullish and outside off, Shehzad shuffles across, misses the attempted lap-scoop. Loses his balance and falls on the floor. Shehzad is struggling to put bat on the ball
one for the over! Extra lift on this shortish one outside off, Mukhtar can't ramp it away
First six of the game. Length-delivery on middle, in the hitting zone. Mukhtar stands tall and launches it over wide long-on
Taskin responds with the back-of-the-hand slowy one. Mukhtar is early into the swipe and is defeated
and again! This was dug in shortish and boings outside off, swings and misses, again
slowy shortish ball on off, he is early into the slog again. Off the inner part of bat and sneaks away to leg

Taskin strikes! He sets off on a celebratory run and chest-bumps Mash. Oh wait, the umpires check for a possible no-ball. Looks like Taskin has some part of his heel behind the crease. It's a legal ball. Good length ball outside off, Shehzad stands on the front foot and lifts it in the air. Mash runs across to his left from long-off and completes a tumbling catch. Shehzad's misery is over
beaten first up. Back of a length and curling away outside off, Afridi pushes with his feet in cement
on a length and outside off, swipe and a miss from the Pakistan captain
good length coming in on off, punched back to the bowler. He dives to his left and stops the ball. He is leading by example on the field
shortish slowy ball outside off, Afridi shuffles across and chips it wide of midwicket
length outside off, he stands tall and lashes it to the covers. Mahmudullah fails to throw the stumps down
change of pace outside off, Afridi waits on it and glides it to point with <s>power</s> soft hands
fullish and on middle, Afridi walks across off, flicks it backward of square leg. They take two by the time Taskin runs across from long leg and mops it up
mighty full, fourth-stump line, Afridi walks across off again. This time he whips it to leg
BOOM goes Afridi. Fractionally back of a length and outside off, swiped hard over backward square leg. Deep square leg has no chance. Flat and powerful
the debutant loses his radar, sprays it miles wide outside off. Past the tram-line

Afridi has nicked off, given out! He gestures for a review. No referrals and Afridi walks back disappointed. He has every reason to be. No bat on that. Back of a length with some lift, curling away outside off. Afridi has a waft at it, the ball zips away to Mushfiq. No nick on that. Debut wicket for Rahman, though
back of a length and swerves in, he is beaten on the inside edge off the back foot. Hit high on the knee-roll of the front pad. Height was factor there
shortish and skiddy on off, tucks up Mukhtar for room. He can only stay back and defend it
fuller and on middle, he nips down the track and eases it to long-on to open his account
length on middle, he whacks it away to the left of deep midwicket. Slight fumble from Mahmudullah and they get two
seam-up ball wide outside off
flatter length-ball on middle, he takes a couple of paces forward and lofts it over the bowler's head. Long-off runs across to his right, tries to haul it in. The ball spins away and they take four
pushed through fuller, he wants to go big, slices it in front of long-off now off a thick outside edge
down the track and chipped to the left of the bowler
flat and darted on middle and leg, whipped away to midwicket
he makes room outside leg, fired down leg. Wide

Mukhtar steps away, Sunny sees it and darts it outside leg. The batsman wants to swing over covers and misses. Mushfiq collects the ball in a flash and takes the bails off. Replays show that Mukhtar had lost his balance and dragged his back foot out of the crease. And his foot was on the line when Mushfiq whipped the bails off. Sharp work behind the wicket. The TV umpire gives Mukhtar the marching orders
Hafeez reaps reward for positive intent. He knew mid-on was in the circle. Down the track and lofted over the fielder
down the track, takes this flatter ball outside off and plays a shovel-drive to the off-side sweeper
Sunny gives it some air on middle, Haris comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler. He makes a half-stop and collides with Hafeez
down the track and slugged away to long-on. The fielder dives to his right and prevents the ball from reaching the boundary
fuller and on middle and leg, whipped away through midwicket
slides on outside off and keeps low to beat Hafeez on the flashy cut
length, stops on Hafeez as he chips down the track and check-drives it to long-off
slid through on middle and leg, punched to the left of the bowler
looks like a seam-up back of a length ball on middle, he stands tall and punches it to long-off for one
angled fuller on middle, down the track and driven past the diving bowler to long-off
darted flatter and quicker on middle, down the track and drilled to long-off
very full and outside off, Hafeez attacks it and slices it over short third man (Tamim), the ball runs away to the boundary
slowy length-ball outside off, be sinks to one knee and swipes it towards cow corner. Long-on (Shakib) moves to his right and limits it to two
hacked to long-on off the inside half of the bat
very full and at the base of off, whipped away to long-on. The pair aim for a second run but decide against it
length ball on the stumps, he shuffles across and clips it in front of square on the leg side. Deep midwicket moves to his right and cleans it up
fuller and straighter, whippily driven to wide long-on for one. They do not take on Mahmudullah's arm for the second
back of a length and outside leg, following Haris and tucking him up for room. Punched to extra-cover
Hafeez walks across off, aims to lap this length ball away. Does not connect
near yorker outside off, Hafeez angles his bat and squeezes it away to deep third man
Top, top strike from Haris. Banged in shortish, directed at the ribs. He swivels on the back foot and deposits over the deep midwicket boundary with a strong pull
Haris makes room, manufactures a full toss and slaps it to sweeper cover
pitched up and outside off, Hafeez bends his knee and drives it imperiously over the covers, skims away to the boundary
Haris advances down the track, this full-toss is powered away to long-off. The press for two and get it
down the track, nearly yorks himself, jammed out to long-off. Only one, here
tossed up, slower through the air on middle and leg, He sinks to one knee and mihits a slog-sweep to deep midwicket
nips down the track, yorks himself now and jabs it back to Shakib
down the track again, takes it on the full and drives it down to long-off
slid through outside off, Hafeez makes a bit of room and drills a drive past the covers. Beats deep cover with ease
back of a length and wide outside off as he sees the batsman make room. Slapped away behind square on the off side. Nasir Hossain slides across in the deep from sweeper cover and keps it to two
shortish and just outside off, chopped towards point
length angled across, he swipes and does not connect
Hafeez shuffles across off, exposes middle and leg. The debutant pushes this wide outside off. Hafeez can't connect
plumb in front, the forefinger goes up! This was very full and on middle, Hafeez shuffles across off and does not meet with the attempted paddle-sweep. Smacked on the front pad
length on the stumps, slogged to deep midwicket
flatter, fuller outside off, pushed down to long-off. Sarkar attacks the ball and limits it to one
low full toss on middle and leg, mishit to the leg side
flat and hurled on leg, whipped to cow corner
full toss outside off, slapped over the bowler's head. Long-off runs across to his left and has it covered
much quicker, he hunts for a reverse-sweep and does not connect. The pair scamper across for a bye
Shakib finishes off with a tight yorker, the batsman gets an inside edge onto the pad
full and on middle and off, Tanvir gets under it and swipes it to long-on. They seek two but decide against it in the end
length on leg stump, he backs away and slogs it to deep midwicket. The throw was weak, allowing the second to be pinched
he steps away outside leg, Taskin follows the batsman with a full toss, which is pushed down to long-on
near yorker on the leg stump, wanders away behind square leg off the pad
Haris makes room again, another full toss, which is bunted to long-on

Run-out on the second. Tanvir is gone off the last ball, he is caught miles short. Very full and on midde, whipped away towards long-on. The fielder swoops down on the ball, fires a flat, accurate throw to Mushfiq, who tips the bails off. Good work from Sabbir
